name: Restaurant Website Offer
subject: Boost {business_name}'s Online Presence with a Custom Restaurant Website
content:
Dear {business_name} team,

I noticed your restaurant could benefit from a modern, professional website. As a specialist in restaurant websites, I can help you:

✓ Showcase your menu beautifully
✓ Accept online orders
✓ Handle reservations automatically
✓ Display customer reviews

Would you like to see some examples of restaurant websites we've created?

Best regards,
{sender_name}
{company_name}
